Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNuimberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure.place}}
{{flight.departure.time | date}}
{{flight.departure.time | date: 'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arival.place}}
{{flight.arival.time | date}}
{{flight.arival.time | date: 'shortTime'}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FlightService, FlightRm } from '../flight.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flight', templateUrl: './search-flight.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flight.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = []; // Define the searchResult property constructor(private flightService: FlightService) { } ngOnInit(): void { // Fetch flight data and assign it to searchResult this.flightService.searchFlights().subscribe(data => { this.searchResult = data; }); } }
